Pre-Game Insights: Guyana’s Golden Jaguars are intensifying preparations for their crucial clash against Suriname in League A of the Concacaf Nations League on Thursday (September 5)
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will start at 16:00h at the National Track and Field Centre, West Coast Demerara.
Tickets cost G$2,000 and are available at the Guyana Football Federation’s office at Section ‘K’ Campbellville, Georgetown.
The Federation is encouraging fans to wear yellow in support of the Golden Jaguars.
